title: Welcome to Slovak E-invoicing system EINVOICE
introduction: This system will support 5 different use-cases
version1: Slovak business (or government) to slovak business (government) invoices
version2: Business (or government) to business (or government) invoices for foreign receivers
version3: Business (or government) to government invoices for foreign issuers
version4: Business (or government) to business invoices for foreign issuers
announcement1: All use-cases will be released sequentially, currently all of them are under development
